content.text: Now let me check your current calendar to see what's already booked this week, and then work with both agents to create your reading-integrated schedule.

input.query: I need to analyze the user's calendar for the upcoming week to identify all available time slots outside of their 9-5 work schedule. Please show me what's currently booked and identify optimal time slots for adding dedicated reading sessions. The user wants to integrate regular reading time into their schedule and is looking for a comprehensive weekly plan.
